text: Daniel Olmo Carvajal (born 7 May 1998) is a Spanish professional footballer. He plays as an attacking midfielder or as a winger for LaLiga club F.C Barcelona and the Spain national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League Cup Cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Dinamo Zagreb II 2015–16 Druga HNL 15 1 — — 15 1 2016–17 10 2 — — 10 2 Total 25 3 — — 25 3 Dinamo Zagreb 2014–15 Prva HNL 5 0 — — 5 0 2015–16 1 0 1 1 — 2 1 2016–17 14 1 4 3 — 18 4 2017–18 26 8 5 1 2 0 33 9 2018–19 25 8 3 1 16 3 44 12 2019–20 9 3 2 0 11 5 22 8 Total 80 20 15 6 29 8 124 34 RB Leipzig 2019–20 Bundesliga 12 3 1 1 2 1 15 5 2020–21 3 0 1 0 0 0 4 0 Total 15 3 2 1 2 1 19 5 Career total 120 26 17 7 31 9 168 42 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Spain 2019 1 1 2020 3 0 Total Total 4 1 ====International goals==== :Scores and results list Spain's goal tally first. No. Date Venue Cap Opponent Score Result Competition 1 15 November 2019 Estadio Ramón de Carranza, Cádiz, Spain 1 5–0 7–0 UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying ==Honours== ===Club=== Dinamo Zagreb *Croatian First League (5): 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18, 2018–19, 2019–20 *Croatian Cup (3): 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18 *Croatian Super Cup (1): 2019 ===International=== Spain U21 *UEFA European Under-21 Championship: 2019 ===Individual=== International *UEFA European Under-21 Championship – Team of the Tournament: 2019 *UEFA European Under-21 Championship Final – Man of the Match: 2019 *UEFA Champions League – Matchday 6 – Goal of the Week: 2019 *UEFA Champions League – Breakthrough XI: 2019 National and regional *Tportal – Croatian First League best player: 2018 *Football Oscar – Croatian First League best player: 2019 *Football Oscar – Croatian First League best U-21 player: 2019 *Football Oscar – Croatian First League team of the Year: 2019 *GNK Dinamo Zagreb – Player of the Year: 2019 *SIMPOSAR International Sports Symposium – Discovery of the Year: 2019 *Young Catalan Player of the Year Runner-up: 2019 ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at the Dinamo Zagreb website * * * * Category:1998 births Category:Footballers from Catalonia Category:People from Terrassa Category:Living people Category:RB Leipzig players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
